name: Gemini 3
description: Google DeepMind's most intelligent AI model to date, designed to bring any idea to life. Gemini 3 combines advanced language understanding with multimodal perception, accepting text, images, video, audio, and code as inputs. Excels at deep reasoning and context understanding with an unprecedented 1 million token context window.
best_for: Learning and research with complex materials
consider_if: You need the most intelligent AI model for complex reasoning, multimodal understanding, creative projects, or agentic task automation with deep Google ecosystem integration.
limitations: Ultra-premium features like Deep Think mode require expensive subscription. Best suited for Google ecosystem users.
pricing: Free tier available | Google AI Pro $20/month | Google AI Ultra $249.99/month
